tool.name: Delete biomaterials
tool.command:
tripaille expression delete_biomaterials
#if $names: --names '$names' #end if #if $organism_id: --organism_id '$organism_id' #end if #if $analysis_id: --analysis_id '$analysis_id' #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: names
param.label: Names
param.help: JSON list of biomaterial names to delete.
